title: Catherine the Great: a profile in power
creator_credit: Arthur Voronka, Learning Corporation of America and Look Hear Productions
brief_description: Explores, through use of an imaginary historical interview, the life and the role of Catherine the Great of Russia. Cast includes Zoe Caldwell and Patrick Watson. Written by Patrick Withrow. Suitable for secondary school level.
